About
LIVE LIFE TO THE FULLEST, SURROUNDING YOURSELF WITH THE PEOPLE YOU LOVE AND THE PASSION THAT DRIVES YOU TO PURSUE YOUR DREAMS
 
I am a singer/actor. My family is German. Our name is German but also Swiss and Austrian. The English pronunciation of my name is /ryk/ simply rhyming with 'bike'. My family has always pronounced our name as it is pronounced in Austria. The beginning 'R' trills with a very harsh /k/ ending as the ending 'ch' in 'Bach'. Welcome to my page.
Henrik Adamsen
Reich
